explains: v. 隐匿，隐藏；隐瞒（真实感情或真相）；遮盖，遮住

sentences.en: Tim could barely conceal his disappointment.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆几乎掩饰不住自己的失望。

sentences.en: If only he could conceal his part in the accident.
sentences.cn: 如果他能掩盖他在那次事故中有份参与就好了。

sentences.en: He didn't attempt to dissimulate or conceal his true feelings.
sentences.cn: 他没有尝试着掩饰或隐瞒自己的感受。
